content.description:
Olly Olly Oxen Free climbs a short overhang with good hands and bad feet.

Sit start with a right hand crimp and a left hand two-finger dimple-edge. From there, pop up to an big, irregular left hand hold that just doesn't feel as good as it looks, match next to it, then pop up again to an incut edge, match, then to it out using a crimp and bumps.
content.protection: Pair of pads. The landing is decent, but there are a few rocks behind the fall zone.
content.location: It climbs the center of Foundation's west face.

content.description: Sit start with with your choice of edge or bump. From there, pull up to a left hand edge, reach a right hand pinch, then gain the horizontal rail, follow to a right hand sloper, reach an edge up high and mantle atop the boulder.
content.protection: Pair of pads. The landing is good, but there are some rocks.
content.location: It climbs just right of Olly Olly Oxen Free on the west face.

content.description: Sit start at the undercling in the hueco. Move your left hand up to a large crimp then right hand out to a nice lip. Keep a toe hooked in the hueco, move your left hand around lip, and work up to more nice holds to top out.
content.location: Work out right from the sit start, another route goes out left.

content.description: Sit start with pair of edges. From there, pull up to a right hand gaston, reach a left hand sidepull-pinch, follow to a right hand sloper, then finish up the remaining edges for an easy finish.
content.protection: A pad or two will work well. The landing is clear but sloping.
content.location: It climbs the south face of Foundation.

content.description:
Sit start with hands matched on the hueco's undercling.  From there, move out left to a pair of obvious crimps.  At this point, hit the sloping lip and pull over and onto the highly featured slab for the topout.

The move to the lip is likely the crux.
content.protection: A few pads, the landing has a few rocks behind it.
content.location: This ascends the North face of Foundation Rock.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched at the hueco. From there, reach a left hand sloping edge, heel, pull out to and match on an edge, turn that heel hook into a toe hook, reach a right hand pinch, then a left hand sloping edge, bring the feet along, gain a right hand incut edge, follow to a left hand edge at the lip, and then finish on the bumps for an easy finish.
content.protection: At least a pair of pads. The landing has a few rocks that pad nicely.
content.location:
It climbs the west face of Foundation. Use the same start as

Ever Wandering

and

Bomb For A Bomb

, and do the same finish as

Olly Olly Oxen Free

.
